displayMessageTitle.message: You received a PostGuard encrypted email from

displayMessageHeading.message: You need to prove who you are to decrypt and read this email.

displayMessageQrPrefix.message: Scan the QR code with the IRMA app to disclose your e-mail address.

displayMessageIrmaHelpBody.message: The IRMA app is a separate privacy-friendly authentication app (which is used also for other authentication purposes).

composeSwitchBarEnabled.message: The contents and attachments of this email will be encrypted.

composeSwitchBarDisabled.message: The contents and attachments of this email will not be encrypted.

composeBccWarning.message: PostGuard does not support BCC. Either remove BCC or disable PostGuard.
